img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 92.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fa/Wukong_Thunderclap_92.jpg)
If you dodge instead, be ready for him to pivot into a jumping slash attack after landing, which will expel a cyclone of blade slashes around him after a short delay.
img_below_text:
Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment.
![Wukong Thunderclap 96.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Thunderclap_96.jpg)

If you dodge instead, be ready for him to pivot into a jumping slash attack after landing, which will expel a cyclone of blade slashes around him after a short delay."
        - Following Text: "Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment.
![Wukong Thunderclap 96.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Thunderclap_96.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against the "Macaque Chief." The boss is airborne, preparing an attack, while the player character, Wukong, stands ready with a glowing staff. The red-hued arena and visual effects suggest a high-stakes moment, with the boss's health bar visible at the bottom of the screen. The preceding and following text describe the boss's moves, including a jumping slash attack and projectile feathers, emphasizing the need for strategic dodging or countering.
